subject: Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: Deweycheatumnhowe will put a 14-race winning streak on the line from the rail Saturday in the $1.5 million Hambletonian at Meadowlands Racetrack. Deweycheatumnhowe, the dominant 3-year-old trotter, was made the 2-5 favorite to capture the Hambletonian, harness racing’s biggest prize. He is the first unbeaten horse to reach the final.
